name: TrademarkFly
tag_list: law, legal, trademark, intellectual-property, saas, service, uspto, kassing, patent, b2b
overview:
Trademark Fly’s mission is to deliver unique, cutting edge solutions in automatic calendaring and monitoring services for intellectual property portfolios of law firms, corporations and individual owners in a non-technical non-lawyer manner while maintaining the strength of the product.

Using web-enabled technology, Trademark Fly automates the complex, error prone, time intensive processes involved in traditional trademark calendaring and monitoring. Their technology brings the cost of regular trademark maintenance down to “after thought” level prices. Trademark Fly provides instant access to vital information on due dates, similar marks, internet advertising, trademark clearance, and all United States Patent and Trademark Offices (“USPTO”) actions.

They provide novel solutions that are easier to implement than the competition. Trademark Fly’s monitoring and calendaring systems offer the only truly integrated, holistic and consistent product specific to the vast majority of trademark owners and law firms. Trademark Fly is attractive to the small trademark filer due to its user friendly interface and it is comprehensive enough for the large portfolio owner to use in-house for regular trademark maintenance.

They market, to over 1,000 US trademark filers per day, a service that adds value to their investment and aids in protecting their good will.
